title: Cannibal Fat Camp
description: Miles Landish canâ€™t help himself. He eats and eats and eats and eats just to fill an empty, gaping, hole in his self esteem. Nothing ever seems to fill that hole, even the five star meals Miles' wealthy parents make possible. So, as a last resort, Miles attends Camp Tum Tum, a weight control camp for spoiled teens. What happens there is only hinted at in high social circles, but the truth must be told. Facing starvation, the campers at Tum Tum make a decision that very few human beings have made. That decision turns Camp Tum Tum into... Cannibal Fat Camp!***Also contains the short stories:Glamgina by David C. HayesThe Chest by Mar C. ScioneauxThat Other Plan from Outer Space by David C. HayesAn Unexpected Hunt by Mark C. Scioneaux
author: Mark C. Scioneaux
